title: Mazda Motor Corporation
description: Mazda Motor Corporation, a leading brand in the automobile industry, utilizes a dynamic color palette. The primary color is #0080C5, a vibrant blue reflecting innovation and creativity. Accompanying the blue is #BBBBBB, a sophisticated gray, and #000000, a timeless black, showcasing their commitment to elegance and quality. These colors are prominently featured on the official Mazda website, mazda.com.
